body.name: Colgate Keep Manual Toothbrush Whitening Starter Kit - Silver, 1 count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 6 mins
features: Replaceable head manual toothbrush for 80% less plastic*. *Compared to similarly sized Colgate toothbrushes
Spiral bristles and whitening cups to polish stains away for a bright smile
A grip that doesn’t slip for control while brushing
Cleans teeth, tongue, cheeks and gums
body.description: Less plastic waste—more clean! Colgate® Keep is a replaceable head manual toothbrush for 80% less plastic*. Spiral bristles and whitening cups polish stains away for a bright smile. Plus, our unique tongue and cheek cleaner helps get rid of more bacteria**. Colgate® Keep has a long-lasting and lightweight aluminum handle with a grip that doesn’t slip for control while brushing. * Compared to similarly sized Colgate toothbrushes **vs. brushing teeth alone with an ordinary flat-trim toothbrush

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really hate shopping for toothbrushes. Found this perfect solution to just replace the heads and stocked up on those too. Love the design, comfortable to hold, and will last pretty much forever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handle is aluminum as advertised
reviews.reviewText: The heads are sturdy, actually they are adult proof when it comes to removing them... It's pretty stout... Now the only complaint is that the bristles are rougher than your typical/average plastic toothbrush. But that isn't a problem for me. I would definitely buy this toothbrush again if mine magically vanished to Narnia or something

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We love this product! It cleans as well as the dr. Polanka tooth brush. This is enviromentally conscious. You can pack it for camping and it can be removed on the top to replace the brush. I love the metal curve design. It condoms to my hands and is very comfortable. I will purchase another one!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: I love almost everything about this toothbrush. I like the way it fits my hand. Easier to grasp with the way it's designed; plus handle is just a better quality than ordinary toothbrushes. The brush itself could be a little stiffer; but I feel it really gets my teeth clean which is really the bottom line. It says to change the brush head every 3 months; but after two it's pretty worn. Colgate has a winner here 👏

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great as a travel toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: Love how sturdy this is, and the design makes it easy to pack for travel. I have bought a second one to keep in my gym bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the metal feel of this toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a metal toothbrush to match my metal safety razor and this was the only toothbrush I could find. I am actually very happy with my purchase and they both look so elegant together.I used to have an electric toothbrush but I got rid of it because I grew annoyed by the loud noise it made and I realized I didn't actually need an electric toothbrush. This manual one works perfectly, uses far less plastic, has a very durable and sturdy build quality, has replaceable tips, and looks absolutely beautiful.Just get it, it's a toothbrush. What more is there to say?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eco friendly toothbrush!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love the concept of this toothbrush, it literally blew my mind that these aren’t more widespread. The head fits snugly on the brush handle and doesn’t move at all while cleaning but it’s still very easy to remove and change the head when you’re ready. It takes a few times to get used to the weight and feel of the toothbrush but that doesn’t take long. Would love to see this in a wider range of colours for larger households (only comes in silver and navy blue). Would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Mango Metálico con 2 repuestos 100% recomendable. Cumple con lo prometido
reviews.reviewText: Reseña después de 5 meses de uso, mango metálico como se especifica, el paquete que yo compré contiene 2 repuestos de la parte de plástico que se ajusta al mango, no he tenido la necesidad de cambiar la parte de plástico del cepillo aunque se recomienda hacerlo cada 6 meses. Si buscas eso es 100% recomendable.Cabe señalar que las cerdas son firmes y si estás acostumbrado a cerdas suaves, puede ser incómodo, desconozco si hay reemplazos con otra configuración de cerdas.
El cepillo se siente increíble, lava perfecto los dientes y es suave con las encías

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buen material del mango, el cepillo regular
reviews.reviewText: Me encanta el mango, una idea genial, sin embargo sería bueno tener más opciones de cepillo ya que solo es un estilo el que manejan y no es mi favorito el tipo de cerdas.
Cumple con su función, un cepillo casi común, pero un cepillo de mejor calidad.
